name: Museum Project
description: Welcome to the Museum. In this large scaled building, you'll find statues, old fashioned items and more on display. Make your way through one of four different rooms, each with models(credit to the original owners).  You'll be greeted with large doors entering the grand room with a massive chandelier. Rooms are located left, right and north from the main room in the center. Feel free to view these artifacts in which ever order you please.
